sentences.sContent: Did you hear his frenzied tattle?
sentences.sCn: 你听见这疯狂的闲谈了吗？

sentences.sContent: But does tittle-tattle really help attract more friends?
sentences.sContent_eng: But does tittle-tattle really help attract more friends?
sentences.sCn: 但闲聊真的能吸引来更多的朋友吗？

words.tran: 说闲话的人；搬弄是非的人

trans.tranOther: to talk about other people’s private lives
